name: Lich
description: Undead caster that inflicts curses to enemies, increasing the damage they take and reducing their movement speed.

aura.name: Cursed Wounds (Slow)
aura.description: Reduces movement speed of nearby enemies by 60%. Lingers for 1s.

aura.name: Cursed Wounds (Vulnerability)
aura.description: Increases damage taken by nearby enemies by 32%. Lingers for 1s.
